assessments.status_rationale: No official August 2025 Average Hourly Earnings release yet; coverage references expectations, not results.
Nonfarm payrolls for August 2025 have not been reported; articles discuss potential Fed implications, not the actual print.
No verified close for the 2-year Treasury at or below 3.85% in the news; requires market close or FRED data.
No evidence of VIX closes at or above 20; market commentary is forward-looking without specific close data.
EIA gasoline inventories for the week ending 2025-09-06 will be reported on 2025-09-11; no data yet.
No tally of UKMTO incident reports provided; need official UKMTO advisories during September to confirm.
No Drewry WCI Shanghai–Los Angeles update versus the 2025-08-29 baseline in today’s coverage.
Apple’s pricing will be announced at the September 9 event; no definitive reporting yet.
